node.title: Pt 3-The Holy Spirit and the Coming of Christ
node.description: "What sincere Christian does not long to be like Jesus? This message explores the process, practice, and power needed to become like Jesus.  But most importantly the role the Holy Spirit plays in the accomplishment of this great work.  The anticipation of the Spirit in what He is producing through our lives reaches its climax at the 2nd coming of Jesus."
